Subject: Heating up
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster converged towards where Astroblast's signal had originated. He
had just exited spain, and he left a trail of smoke where he had been
damaged, and he couldnt think straight. All he wanted was to crush the life
out of one measely bot, was that to much to ask. He saw the group of
robots, as he approached and honked his horn, which made a huge noise.
